the_white_lotus.Title: The White Lotus
the_white_lotus.Actors: Jon Gries, Natasha Rothwell, Jennifer Coolidge
the_white_lotus.Plot: Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.
the_white_lotus.Awards: Won 16 Primetime Emmys. 78 wins & 217 nominations total

severance.Title: Severance
severance.Actors: Adam Scott, Britt Lower, Zach Cherry
severance.Plot: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives. When a mysterious colleague appears outside of work, it begins a journey to discover the truth about their jobs.
severance.Awards: Won 10 Primetime Emmys. 42 wins & 180 nominations total

the_last_of_us.Title: The Last of Us
the_last_of_us.Actors: Bella Ramsey, Pedro Pascal, Gabriel Luna
the_last_of_us.Plot: Twenty years after modern civilization has been destroyed, Joel, a hardened survivor, is hired to smuggle Ellie, a 14-year-old girl, out of an oppressive quarantine zone. What starts as a small job soon becomes a brutal, heartbreaking journey, as they both must traverse the U.S. and depend on each other for survival.
the_last_of_us.Awards: Won 9 Primetime Emmys. 103 wins & 187 nominations total

wednesday.Title: Wednesday
wednesday.Actors: Jenna Ortega, Hunter Doohan, Emma Myers
wednesday.Plot: Follows Wednesday Addams' years as a student, when she attempts to master her emerging psychic ability, thwart a killing spree, and solve the mystery that embroiled her parents.
wednesday.Awards: Won 4 Primetime Emmys. 23 wins & 65 nominations total

squid_game.Title: Squid Game
squid_game.Actors: Lee Jung-jae, Halley Kim, Wi Ha-joon
squid_game.Plot: A story of people who fail at life for various reasons, but suddenly receive a mysterious invitation to participate in a survival game to win more than 38 million US dollars. The game takes place at an isolated island and the participants are locked up until there is a final winner. The story will incorporate popular children's games from the 1970s and 1980s of Korea, such as squid game, literal translation of its Korean name, which is a type of tag where offense and defense use a squid-shaped board drawn in the dirt.
squid_game.Awards: Won 6 Primetime Emmys. 54 wins & 89 nominations total

stranger_things.Title: Stranger Things
stranger_things.Actors: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder
stranger_things.Plot: In a small town where everyone knows everyone, a peculiar incident starts a chain of events that leads to the disappearance of a child, which begins to tear at the fabric of an otherwise peaceful community. Dark government agencies and seemingly malevolent supernatural forces converge on the town, while a few of the locals begin to understand that there's more going on than meets the eye.
stranger_things.Awards: Won 12 Primetime Emmys. 118 wins & 320 nominations total

house_of_the_dragon.Title: House of the Dragon
house_of_the_dragon.Writer: Ryan J. Condal, George R.R. Martin
house_of_the_dragon.Actors: Matt Smith, Emma D'Arcy, Olivia Cooke
house_of_the_dragon.Plot: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.
house_of_the_dragon.Awards: Won 2 Primetime Emmys. 22 wins & 97 nominations total

the_bear.Title: The Bear
the_bear.Actors: Jeremy Allen White, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ayo Edebiri
the_bear.Plot: A young chef from the fine dining world returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop.
the_bear.Awards: Won 21 Primetime Emmys. 115 wins & 200 nominations total

shogun.Title: Shogun
shogun.Writer: James Clavell (based on the novel by)
shogun.Actors: Cosmo Jarvis, Hiroyuki Sanada, Anna Sawai
shogun.Plot: Set in the 17th Century, the story is told from the perspective of British hero John Blackthorne, a sailor who rises from outsider to samurai, while being used as a pawn in Japanese leader Toranaga's struggle to reach the top of the ruling chain, or Shogun.
shogun.Awards: Won 18 Primetime Emmys. 91 wins & 77 nominations total

baby_reindeer.Title: Baby Reindeer
baby_reindeer.Actors: Richard Gadd, Jessica Gunning, Nava Mau
baby_reindeer.Plot: The story follows Donny's warped relationship with a female stalker and the impact it has on him as he is ultimately forced to face a deep, dark buried trauma.
baby_reindeer.Awards: Won 6 Primetime Emmys. 40 wins & 66 nominations total
